name: Knight
description: Melee weapons and heavy armour High defence and hitpoints make you a difficult target to bring down. Choose between swords, clubs, shields and two handed axes. Use sword, axe/scythe and club to attack.

name: Ranger
description: Ranged weapons and medium armour Consistent ranged damage and good survivability makes you an excellent addition to any party. You are a master of the bow. Use arrows to attack with the bow.

name: Mage
description: Offensive spells and light armour Low health but high ranged damage makes you a real glass cannon. Runes allow you to do massive bursts of damage and heal allies. You wield the elements. Uses pots of mana to attack with the staff and can use support and attack runes.

name: Shaman
description: Support spells and light armour This is a new class focused specifically around bringing support utility to the game. The Shaman has no instant offensive spells, instead bringing self heal, targeted heal, and mass heal to the table.
